metadata.name: Confidence Game
metadata.description:
On the back of her bedroom door, Shantell used to have multiples of the words WHO ARE YOU. They made her think about what she wanted to achieve that day and what kind of person she was and wished to be. It encouraged her to be conscious of the question “Am I being ME?!”  

Throughout her career Shantell has since handed out these cards, placed posters with the message and sticker bombed internationally, to wake the consciousness of others. ARE YOU YOU and YOU ARE YOU are extensions of this first WHO ARE YOU question.  

As an adaptation of that series, this animation explores the theme through the Confidence Game 3 card monte, alternating between the three messages, and exercising the need to continually question and discover oneself through a loop of self discovery.
